column2: A block from the palace we bunched together and, by sheer mass and ferocity, actually stopped the machinelike advance for a few moments. Miscellaneous weapons had been brought from the houses--sledges, stone benches, anything that might break the Quabos' helmets--and handed to us in silence by the noncombatants.
column3: A block from the palace we bunched together and, by sheer mass and ferocity, actually stopped the machinelike advance for a few moments. Miscellaneous weapons had been brought from the houses-sledges, stone benches, anything that might break the Quabos' helmets-and handed to us in silence by the noncombatants.

column2: Somebody tugged at my sleeve.
column3: Somebody tugged at my sleeve.

column2: Looking down I saw a little girl.
column3: Looking down I saw a little girl.

column2: Disregarding the clutching tentacles entirely, I swung the bar against the helmet.
column3: Disregarding the clutching tentacles entirely, I swung the bar against the helmet.

column2: It cracked.
column3: It cracked.

column2: I swung again and it fell in fragments, spilling the gallons of water it had contained.
column3: I swung again and it fell in fragments, spilling the gallons of water it had contained.

column2: Why art thou here!	Why art thou here!
Go back to the palace at once!"
column3: Go back to the palace at once!"

column2: I came to fight beside thee, she answered composedly, though her delicate lips quivered.
column3: I came to fight beside thee, she answered composedly, though her delicate lips quivered.

column2: Fighting vainly, the population of Zyobor was swept into the palace grounds, then into the building itself.
column3: Fighting vainly, the population of Zyobor was swept into the palace grounds, then into the building itself.

column2: An ironic picture came to me of the crowding masses of Quabos stuffed into the protection of the outer cave, waiting the outcome of the fight being waged by their warriors.
column3: An ironic picture came to me of the crowding masses of Quabos stuffed into the protection of the outer cave, waiting the outcome of the fight being waged by their warriors.

column2: Though there was little doubt in the minds of any of us as to what the outcome would be.
column3: Though there was little doubt in the minds of any of us as to what the outcome would be.

column2: The Quabos, able only to enter one at a time, halted a moment and there was a badly needed breathing spell.
column3: The Quabos, able only to enter one at a time, halted a moment and there was a badly needed breathing spell.

column2: We've got to find some drastic means of defence, said the Professor, "or we won't last another three hours."
column3: We've got to find some drastic means of defence, said the Professor, "or we won't last another three hours."

column2: If you asked me, I'd say we couldn't last another three hours anyway, replied Stanley with a shrug.
column3: If you asked me, I'd say we couldn't last another three hours anyway, replied Stanley with a shrug.

column2: These fish have out-thought us!
column3: These fish have out thought us!

column2: Nonsense!	Nonsense!
A brace of machine-guns.... I murmured hopefully.
column3: A brace of machine guns.... I murmured hopefully.

column2: You might as well wish for a dozen light cannon! snapped the Professor.
column3: You might as well wish for a dozen light cannon! snapped the Professor.

column2: Please try to concentrate, and see if any effective weapon suggests itself to you--something more available at the moment than machine-guns.
column3: Please try to concentrate, and see if any effective weapon suggests itself to you-something more available at the moment than machine guns.

column2: Frankly I could think of nothing.
column3: Frankly I could think of nothing.

column2: What weapon could be called forth to be effective against the thick glass helmets?
column3: What weapon could be called forth to be effective against the thick glass helmets?

column2: Glass.	Glass.
What destroys it?
column3: What destroys it?

column2: He turned excitedly to the Queen.
column3: He turned excitedly to the Queen.

column2: I think we have it!	I think we have it!
At least it's worth trying.
column3: At least it's worth trying.

column2: Hast thou, in the palace, any lengths of pipe like to that which the Quabos drag behind them?
column3: Hast thou, in the palace, any lengths of pipe like to that which the Quabos drag behind them?

column2: Then she interrupted herself.
column3: Then she interrupted herself.

column2: Ah, yes!	Ah, yes!
The length of hose--made of some linen-like fabric of tough, shredded sea-weed and covered with a flexible metal sheath--was cut into three pieces each about fifty yards long.
column3: The length of hose-made of some linen like fabric of tough, shredded sea weed and covered with a flexible metal sheath-was cut into three pieces each about fifty yards long.

column2: These were connected to three of the largest gas vents of the palace.
column3: These were connected to three of the largest gas vents of the palace.

column2: Stanley, the Professor and I each took an end.
column3: Stanley, the Professor and I each took an end.

column2: And we prepared to fight, with fire, the creatures of water.
column3: And we prepared to fight, with fire, the creatures of water.

column2: It ought to work, Stanley, repeated several times as though trying to reassure himself as well as us.
column3: It ought to work, Stanley, repeated several times as though trying to reassure himself as well as us.

column2: Unless, retorted the Professor, "their glass has some special heat and cold resisting quality."
column3: Unless, retorted the Professor, "their glass has some special heat and cold resisting quality."

column2: Stanley shrugged.
column3: Stanley shrugged.

column2: How such creatures can make glass at all is beyond me!"
column3: How such creatures can make glass at all is beyond me!"

column2: Dragging our hose to the big front entrance of the palace, and warning the crowded people to keep their feet clear of it, we prepared to test out the efficiency of this, our last resource against the enemy.
column3: Dragging our hose to the big front entrance of the palace, and warning the crowded people to keep their feet clear of it, we prepared to test out the efficiency of this, our last resource against the enemy.

column2: For an instant we paused just inside the doorway, looking out at the ugly, glassed-in Things that were massing to attack us again.
column3: For an instant we paused just inside the doorway, looking out at the ugly, glassed in Things that were massing to attack us again.

column2: The ranks of Quabos had closed in now, till they extended down the street for several hundred yards in close formation--a forest of great pulpy heads with huge eyes that glared unblinkingly at the glittering, pink building that was their objective.
column3: The ranks of Quabos had closed in now, till they extended down the street for several hundred yards in close formation-a forest of great pulpy heads with huge eyes that glared unblinkingly at the glittering, pink building that was their objective.

column2: Light up! ordered Stanley, setting an example by touching his hose nozzle to the nearest wall jet.
column3: Light up! ordered Stanley, setting an example by touching his hose nozzle to the nearest wall jet.

column2: A spurt of fire belched from his hose, streaming out for four or five feet in a solid red cone.
column3: A spurt of fire belched from his hose, streaming out for four or five feet in a solid red cone.

column2: The Professor and I touched off our torches; and we moved slowly out the door toward the ranks of Quabos.
column3: The Professor and I touched off our torches; and we moved slowly out the door toward the ranks of Quabos.

column2: The Quabos in front, supplied with slack in their hoses by those behind, leaped at us with incredible agility.
column3: The Quabos in front, supplied with slack in their hoses by those behind, leaped at us with incredible agility.

column2: We fell back a step so that none should get at our backs.
column3: We fell back a step so that none should get at our backs.

column2: The last stand was begun.
column3: The last stand was begun.

column2: It was not a battle so much as a series of fierce duels.
column3: It was not a battle so much as a series of fierce duels.

column2: We parried and thrust with the flaming hoses in an equally desperate effort to prevent it.
column3: We parried and thrust with the flaming hoses in an equally desperate effort to prevent it.

column2: There was a sickening smell--and the tentacle was jerked spasmodically away.
column3: There was a sickening smell-and the tentacle was jerked spasmodically away.

column2: I caught the hose in my left hand and turned the fiery jet against the water-filled helmet.
column3: I caught the hose in my left hand and turned the fiery jet against the water filled helmet.

column2: A shout of savage exultation broke from my lips.
column3: A shout of savage exultation broke from my lips.

column2: The tentacle around my arm tightened, then relaxed.
column3: The tentacle around my arm tightened, then relaxed.

column2: I went toward the next one, swinging the flaring hose in a slow arc as I advanced.
column3: I went toward the next one, swinging the flaring hose in a slow arc as I advanced.

column2: The creature lunged at me and threshed at the burning jet with all four of its feelers.
column3: The creature lunged at me and threshed at the burning jet with all four of its feelers.

column2: Nevertheless with a swift move it slapped a tentacle squarely down over the hose nozzle.
column3: Nevertheless with a swift move it slapped a tentacle squarely down over the hose nozzle.

column2: The flame was extinguished as the flame of a candle is pinched out between thumb and forefinger.
column3: The flame was extinguished as the flame of a candle is pinched out between thumb and forefinger.

column2: I retreated.
column3: I retreated.

column2: Catch! came a voice behind me.
column3: Catch! came a voice behind me.

column2: The Professor swung his four-foot jet my way.
column3: The Professor swung his four foot jet my way.

column2: And still there appeared to be hundreds of the Quabos left.
column3: And still there appeared to be hundreds of the Quabos left.

column2: By order of the Queen three stout Zyobites stepped up to us and relieved us of our exhausting labor.
column3: By order of the Queen three stout Zyobites stepped up to us and relieved us of our exhausting labor.

column2: And here the Professor took command again.
column3: And here the Professor took command again.

column2: They move so slowly that you can easily cut off their retreat."

column2: There's plenty of it.	There's plenty of it.
The Quabos brought it with them." The Professor turned to me again.

column2: Take metal-saws with you.	Take metal saws with you.
Run!"

column2: Four of our number were caught, but the rest got through unscathed.
column3: Four of our number were caught, but the rest got through unscathed.

column2: Down a side street we raced, and along a parallel avenue toward the tunnel.
column3: Down a side street we raced, and along a parallel avenue toward the tunnel.

column2: As we went I prayed that all the Quabos had centered their attention on the palace and left their vulnerable water-hoses unguarded.
column3: As we went I prayed that all the Quabos had centered their attention on the palace and left their vulnerable water hoses unguarded.

column2: They had!
column3: They had!

column2: When we stole up the last block toward the break we found the nearest Quabo was a hundred yards down the street--and working further away with every move.
column3: When we stole up the last block toward the break we found the nearest Quabo was a hundred yards down the street-and working further away with every move.

column2: At once we set to work on the scores of hoses that quivered over the floor with each move of the distant monsters.
column3: At once we set to work on the scores of hoses that quivered over the floor with each move of the distant monsters.

column2: The metal was soft enough to be sheered through by the stroke.

column2: The cut ends were smashed so that they could not be crammed down over the tapering jets; but we could use our metal-saws for cleaner severances at the other ends.

column2: The giant with the ax stepped from hose to hose.
column3: The giant with the ax stepped from hose to hose.

column2: The end was certain and not long in coming.
column3: The end was certain and not long in coming.

column2: We sprayed the monsters with fire as workmen spray fruit trees with insect poison.
column3: We sprayed the monsters with fire as workmen spray fruit trees with insect poison.

column2: Stanley, the Professor and a Zyobite came up in the rear with their three hoses.
column3: Stanley, the Professor and a Zyobite came up in the rear with their three hoses.

column2: Caught between the two forces, the beaten fish milled in hopeless confusion and indecision.
column3: Caught between the two forces, the beaten fish milled in hopeless confusion and indecision.

column2: In half an hour they were all reduced to huddles of slimy wet flesh that dotted the pavement from the break back to the palace grounds.
column3: In half an hour they were all reduced to huddles of slimy wet flesh that dotted the pavement from the break back to the palace grounds.

column2: Now, said the Professor triumphantly, "we have only to knock out the bottom half of the tunnel wall, empty the tunnel and make sure there are no more Quabos lurking there.
column3: Now, said the Professor triumphantly, "we have only to knock out the bottom half of the tunnel wall, empty the tunnel and make sure there are no more Quabos lurking there.

column2: After that we can fill it in with solid cement.
column3: After that we can fill it in with solid cement.

column2: The Queen can order her fish-servants to guard the outer cave and see that no food gets in to the starving monsters there.
column3: The Queen can order her fish servants to guard the outer cave and see that no food gets in to the starving monsters there.

column2: The Quabos are as good as exterminated at this moment. And I can get back to my zoological work...."
column3: The Quabos are as good as exterminated at this moment. And I can get back to my zoological work...."

column2: We knew each others thoughts well enough.

column2: With the menace of the Quabos banished forever, the city of Zyobor resumed its normal way.
column3: With the menace of the Quabos banished forever, the city of Zyobor resumed its normal way.

column2: The daily tasks and pleasures were picked up where they had been dropped.
column3: The daily tasks and pleasures were picked up where they had been dropped.

column2: He is second to me in power.
column3: He is second to me in power.

column2: We are more than content with our lot here.
column3: We are more than content with our lot here.

column2: Now we have thought of a way in which, with luck, we may communicate with the upper world.
